name: Hijack (ratrising)
description:
Escape the simulation by killing the destroyer!

W/A/S/D for movement, mouse to shoot

Right click to dash

M for Map, I to toggle autofire

Scroll to zoom in / out

Hold Enter to kill yourself, you will respawn as the last enemy you killed!

Game made by: Ratrising

Gameplay:

Hijack is a skill-based top down bullet hell. Dash through waves of bullets and kill the strongest enemy you can find, then die to become him and fight even stronger enemies!

Every block is hand placed -- If you see a hole in the room, check it out! You may be surprised.

PS: Doing the tutorial may reveal the location of the secret boss...

Gameplay Tips:

Try to explore as much as you can, and don't forget to dash!

If you feel the room is too hard, perhaps you need to find an easier room

Sometimes, rushing past enemies to the next room is the best strategy.

There are 5 ships and 11 bullet types.

Green bullets pierce walls, boomerangs home to your mouse. 

---Spoilers---

Walkthrough if you are stuck: 

1) After entering the dungeon, turn left and explore the triangle mines. Kill and become the slave driver.

2) Explore the right side of the map, kill and become the triangle in the room with the sign "Danger Ahead"

3) Walk down into the 1 wide hole in the room with 4 circles shooting green bullets. Keep going down and become the Yellow Square.

4) Use the Yellow Square to kill enemies in the room with the sign "Lair of the Destroyer". Become either the triangle or the circle.

5) With either the triangle or circle, go back into the crawlspace. Instead of going down into the room with the yellow square, go right and kill and become the Blue Moon.

6) Challenge the Destroyer with the Blue Moon. Watch out for the boss's chain fireball attacks!
